str2: Then, at that time. From ho and hote; the when, i.e. At the time that.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Neuter plural of a presumed compound from en and kainos; innovatives, i.e. renewal.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Middle - 3rd Person Singular
str2: A prolongation and middle voice form of a primary verb; to cause to be, i.e. to become, used with great latitude.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.
The Greek form of the Hebrew name: Jerusalem. Of Hebrew origin; Hierosolyma

parse: Verb - Imperfect Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: I am, exist. The first person singular present indicative; a prolonged form of a primary and defective verb; I exist.
From a derivative of cheo, meaning a storm; by implication, the rainy season, i.e. Winter.
